value:
Check out my tail! What's with yours,
anyway, Keaton? Shouldn't you take
better care of it?

I lived in peace in the kitsune hamlet
for a long time. Fighting makes me a
little nervous!

You made the right call to take me
shopping! No one in the whole world
has an eye for aesthetics like mine!

Daily grooming is essential if you
want your hair to look beautiful.
Let me show you how it's done.

I'm grooming the pegasi... Their
manes are so glossy and beautiful!

Hello there, $Nu!
I am here for $Nf!
Stay close, you two!

Even my tail is in perfect condition!
OK, go on, then. Praise me! More!
More!

I must further develop my eye
for aesthetics.

Huh. Maybe I've lost my claws and
turned into a pet fox...
Talk about glossy, am I right?

The name's Kaden. Tell me, do you
know about the kitsune, the most
beautiful race in the world?

What a gorgeous and fun castle you
have here, $Nu!$k$pIt's full of interesting and friendly
people. What fun!$k$pI want to pay you back for
summoning me to such an
amazing place. I insist!$k$pOh, don't tell me that I don't need
to. I really want to! Try and think of
something you want, OK?$k$pThere must be SOMETHING you'd
like me to do for you. Don't be shy!
Tell me what it is.
それっ
そーれっ
うああっ！
あわわわ…
Let's PLAY!
Hahaha!
That's too bad!
See you on the other side!
I'm too gorgeous to die...
Ehehe
I'm Kaden! As you can see, I'm from the most beautiful race in the world, the kitsune!
Tell me, am I cute? Beautiful? I want to hear you say it!
Did I already tell you that I can turn into a big, scary fox?
Anytime someone's nice to me, I have to be nice in return.
I got you a present! What do you think? Isn't it beautiful?
Man, it feels great to finally be appreciated.
I think I'll stay with you from now on. Tell me, aren't you just deliriously happy to hear that?
Sure thing.
Lovely.
I can help!
